title.rendered: Package Trips to Try This Summer

content.rendered:
If you are looking for thrilling adventure for the summer, then we’ve got you covered! Sure, you can head to one of our outposts and do a rafting trip or go ziplining, but you can also amp up your trip with one of our multi-adventure packages! We offer a variety of adventures that can be packaged for your dream vacation. Our package trips are at least one full day and go up to 3+ days! Here are 4 of our adventure package trips that you should check out this summer.

 

 

2 Day Advanced Deluxe | Granite

The 2 Day Advanced Deluxe trip white water rafting adventure combines the best Colorado rafting trips on the Arkansas River with the addition of amazing mountaintop ziplining. You’ll start your white water rafting & camping journey with the class III-V Numbers and Narrows and you’ll end at the bottom of Browns Canyon. This trip provides excellent advanced whitewater rafting, followed by camping and the ziplining through beautiful Colorado scenery.

Upper Clear Creek + Cliffside Ziplining | Idaho Springs

You begin your day flying from ridge to ridge over a forest of Douglas Fir and Ponderosa Pines. Then start descending into the forest flying from tree to tree at speeds up to 30 miles mph as you make your way down the mountain. Between rafting and zip lining enjoy time for a picnic on our deck or head into town (2 min drive, 5 min walk) to grab a bite before embarking on the second half of your adventure. After lunch raft the exciting and technical whitewater of Clear Creek on our intermediate-advanced stretch of whitewater! Starting high in the canyon, there’s just enough time to warm up before you drop into the first class IV rapid. You will encounter 30 major rapids on this 8-mile trip dropping an incredible 1,300 vertical feet.

 

 

Rock Climbing + Mountaintop Ziplining | Granite

Two of the best summer mountain activities can now be combined for the perfect weekend or weekday adventure! Kick things off with rock climbing in the Rockies. After that we will break for a gourmet outdoor lunch and prepare for our afternoon of flying through the trees. A Colorado zip line tour with AVA can take you to new heights through the dense trees and rocky cliffs of our Gold Camp property. It’s the perfect adventure for seeing the mountains.

24 Hours on the Upper Colorado | Kremmling

This trip offers something for everyone!  Enjoy wildlife, serenity, and natural beauty that only the Colorado River can offer.  You’ll have plenty of time to take in historic cabins, scenic waterfalls, and steep canyon walls towering over 100′ above your head. Bald eagles, black bears, and the endangered Colorado river otter are often seen on this fun section of the river. After arriving at camp, you’ll have plenty of time for hiking, fishing, fossil hunting, or just relaxing beside the river while your guides prepare a delicious and hearty dinner. Following a good night’s sleep and filling breakfast, you’ll be ready to head back out to the river for a morning of more fun and relaxation, including time in our inflatable kayaks or on our stand-up paddleboards.

 

Questions about our package trips? Give our trip specialists a call at 877-RAFTING (877-723-8464) to find the perfect trip for you! We look forward to seeing you in Colorado this summer!
